div.em: Current conditions as of 19 Apr 13:53 pm CDT

div.div: Mostly sunny, with a high near 61. Northeast wind 11 to 13 mph, with gusts as high as 18 mph.
A slight chance of rain after 5am. Partly cloudy, with a low around 39. North northeast wind 5 to 8 mph becoming calm in the evening. Chance of precipitation is 10%.

A chance of rain, mainly between 8am and 2pm. Mostly cloudy, then gradually becoming sunny, with a high near 64. Light and variable wind becoming west northwest 10 to 15 mph in the morning. Winds could gust as high as 22 mph. Chance of precipitation is 30%. New precipitation amounts of less than a tenth of an inch possible.

div.em: Current conditions as of 19 Apr 13:53 pm CDT

div.div: Mostly sunny, with a high near 61. Northeast wind 11 to 13 mph, with gusts as high as 18 mph.
A slight chance of rain after 5am. Partly cloudy, with a low around 39. North northeast wind 5 to 8 mph becoming calm in the evening. Chance of precipitation is 10%.

A chance of rain, mainly between 8am and 2pm. Mostly cloudy, then gradually becoming sunny, with a high near 64. Light and variable wind becoming west northwest 10 to 15 mph in the morning. Winds could gust as high as 22 mph. Chance of precipitation is 30%. New precipitation amounts of less than a tenth of an inch possible.
